So: Include a key generator, or the ENTIRE torrent is WORTHLESS.

The best light and easy antivirus to use is Microsoft Essential Security. I'm running Windows 7 64bit full and Microsoft's Essential Security Antivirus is running perfect.

Visit: http://www.microsoft.com/security_essentials/resources.aspx and pick your version to suit your operating system. ITS LIGHT AND FAST.
